main event: A bright round object was observed in the sky for about 4 seconds, blinking off and on three times before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a marble and resembling a bright star., The object was witnessed by a housewife in Ashland, Oregon., The sighting occurred in heavy fog conditions., The object appeared to have a tail exhaust present., The sighting led to various conclusions regarding the nature of the object, including possibilities like a balloon, aircraft, astronomical object, or meteor.
sighted object: a round object like a bright star
witness description: Mrs. St, housewife in Ashland, Oregon
